name: Operation Tower Defense
description:
Conceit

Help your patients help themselves. Delay the inevitable by taking out their organs and letting the patients' immune systems fight off the germs for you. Don't leave the organs out for too long though... 

Controls 
  • left click and drag to place towers 
  • right click a tower to return it to the body
Attribution 
  • Kenney.nl Splat Pack link; license 
  • Heart, lungs, liver, and brain adapted from link; license 
  • Intestine adapted from link; license
  • Body adapted from base meshes by thehumbug: link; license 
  • Palette: DawnBringer 32 by DawnBringer link
  • Fonts: Macintosh 128k, Super Mario 64 (public domain)
  • Portraits generated in Artbreeder

Audio made in audacity
